name: 廖元甫
objective:
1. Course Overview & Introduction
2. Sample Space and Probability
3. Discrete Random Variables
4. Continuous Random Variables
5. Further Topics on Random Variables
schedule:
Ch0: Course Overview & Introduction
Ch1: Sample Space and Probability
Ch2: Discrete Random Variables
Ch3: Continuous Random Variables
Ch4: Further Topics on Random Variables
講義共13個單元，每一章約上四周時間，但第四章只選擇部份內容。
scorePolicy:
1. 約3次小考（包含期中考與期末考）70%
2. 約3次實驗 30%
materials:
課本：
D. P. Bertsekas, J. N. Tsitsiklis, “Introduction to Probability,” Athena Scientific, 1nd Edition (全華代理)
參考書：
1. Roy D. Yates, David J. Goodman, “Probability and Stochastic Processes: A Friendly Introduction for Electrical and Computer Engineers,” 2nd Edition, Wiley, 2004
2. Alberto Leon-Garcia, “Probability and Random Processes for Electrical Engineering”, 2nd Edition, Addison Wesley, Reading, Mass. 1994.，開發圖書有限公司代理
